mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=True)
    res = 1
    while len(counts) > limit:
        res += counts.pop()
    return res

from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=True)
    res = -1
    while len(counts) > limit:
        res += counts.pop()
    return res

from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=True)
    res = 0
    while len(counts) >= limit:

from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=True)
    res = 0
    while len(counts) <= limit:
        res += counts.pop()
    return res

from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=True)
    res = 0
    while len(counts) != limit:
        res += counts.pop()
    return res

from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=True)
    res = 0
    while len(counts) > limit:
        res -= counts.pop()
    return res

from collections import Counter

def minimum_changes(arr, limit):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    counts = sorted(list(counter.values()), reverse=False)
    res = 0
    while len(counts) > limit:
        res += counts.pop()
    return res
